main.areYouSureToEndTraining: Are you sure, you want to end training?
main.levelInscreaseInfoMessage: You increase your level from s1 to s2.  Keep going!
main.levelDecreaseInfoMessage: Your level has dropped from s1 to s2. Don't give up!
main.proVersionBsTitle: New features with the Pro version!
main.disableAdsDesc: Even more comfort. With the Pro version of the app, you won't have to spend time watching commercials while using the app
main.percentTitle: Learn how to calculate percentages and raise to a power
main.percentDesc: Now you can practice exponentiation and percentage calculation in your app, along with other actions
main.changeComplexityDesc: Do you want to challenge yourself or, on the contrary, relax? Change the level to the one you see fit. After that, the complexity of the examples will change so that you will be even more interested in solving them
main.proNotAvailableDesc: Unfortunately, it is not possible to purchase the pro version at this time. Please try again later.
